Package org.centenaire.general

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    WithEditor<T>
    Express abstractly that the class has editors.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Entity
    Superclass of the POJO used for DAO A concrete Entity class T should both inherit from this abstract Entity class implement the interface WithEditor have a static defaultElement method in order to use the generic EntityDialog.
    EntityDialog<T extends WithEditor<T>>
    Dialog box to create a new Entity The input class is required to 'extend' WithEditor, but it really means to 'implement' this interface class.
    EntityEditor<T>
    Abstract class to represent the "editor forms" of entities.
    GeneralController
    Class used to store data regarding the current state of the interface.
    GeneralWindow
    GeneralWindow provides a superclass for the different windows of the project.
    GTable
    A table adapted to our needs!
    ListTableModel
    A superclass for the table models of the project.
